pages.text: This special type of dirt is incredibly common in certain biomes (NOTE: if you are not playing a Biomes o' Plenty world type, the silty dirt instead generates as large clumps underground. As such, none of the advice about biomes will apply.)

The best way to find these biomes is by making or finding a Nature's Compass. This compass can be used to direct you to the nearest biome you specify. Look for the following biomes to find silty dirt:$(li)Cherry blossom grove$(li)Lavender fields$(li)Prairie$(li)Snowy forest$(li)Tundra
